question:
Which of the following countries is included in the Sub-Saharan Africa region?
  1. Tanzania
  2. Mozambique
  3. Botswana
  4. Senegal
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Sub-Saharan Africa is, geographically, the area of the continent of Africa that lies south of the Sahara Desert. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sub-Saharan_Africa
